about_the_game:
*This DLC is also included in "Additional Card Pass Vol.2" which is on sale. It is possible to purchase both individual "Additional Card Sets" and "Additional Card Pass Vol.2", but the acquisition of included contents will only be reflected once.

Cards from Booster Pack “[D-BT10]: Dragon Masquerade” and some other PR cards will be unlocked. Additional cards can be obtained by buying pack “[D-BT10]: Dragon Masquerade” via in-game shop or by crafting.
*Those PR cards are also included in this pack.

[INCLUDED PR CARDS]
D-PR/270EN Impediment Slicer
D-PR/272EN Security Upgrader
D-PR/274EN Sage of Improvement, Robron
D-PR/282EN Bolt Bremar Dragon
D-PR/284EN Galactic B-Hero, Broad Felvis
D-PR/286EN Dearest Affinity, Lysette
D-PR/296EN Stealth Dragon, Raidon Kunai
D-PR/298EN Servant Falcracia
D-PR/300EN Aux Machine Monster, Savoied
D-PR/312EN To The Stars of Horizon Rising in The Night Sky, Yasmin
D-PR/292EN Sapient Owl
D-PR/293EN Blitz Staff, Muna
D-PR/294EN Luster Impact Dragon
D-PR/295EN Time Stamping Dragon
D-PR/237EN Pining Flower Maiden, Claudine

D-SS06/002EN Divine Sister, Gateaubasque
D-SS06/003EN Incision Angel
D-SS06/004EN Starting Magic, Starlily
D-SS06/007EN Knight of Soaring Refinement, Dfyn
D-SS07/002EN Gear Rhinos of Barrelling Impulsion
D-SS07/003EN Divigating Chopper
D-SS07/004EN Clock-hands Dracokid
D-SS07/008EN Purgatory Baron, Hrodis
D-SS08/008EN Polarxis Dragon

For more details on upcoming cards, please check the latest list for "[D-BT10]: Dragon Masquerade" on the Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days official website.

short_description: Unlock cards from [D-BT10]: Dragon Masquerade.The booster pack will be added to the in-game shop, and included cards will be available for crafting.
